Sure, here are a few more content ideas related to fruit:

1. Fruit-inspired art and architecture: Show how fruit has inspired art and architectural design throughout history, from the intricate fruit carvings of Thai cuisine to the whimsical fruit-shaped buildings of Japan.
2. Fruit and spirituality: Explore the role of fruit in various spiritual and religious traditions, such as the symbolism of the pomegranate in Judaism or the fruit offerings made during Hindu festivals.
3. Fruit and the animal kingdom: Highlight the ways in which fruit plays a key role in the diets and habitats of various animals, from primates and birds to bats and insects.
4. Fruit and the world of sports: Show how fruit is used as a source of energy and nutrition in various sports and athletic activities, and provide tips on how athletes can incorporate more fruit into their diets.
5. Fruit and social justice: Discuss the impact of fruit production and distribution on workers and communities around the world, and highlight efforts to promote fair labor practices and sustainability in the fruit industry.

By exploring these topics and others related to fruit, you can create content that engages and informs your audience while also showcasing your company's passion and expertise for all things fruit.
